name: MS-SVDD
paper: Multi-sphere support vector data description for outliers detection on multi-distribution data
description: Multi-Sphere SVDD (Support Vector Data Description) is divided into two key steps, i.e., (1) identify each data distribution in the dataset; (2) establish SVDD for each data distribution and construct multi-SVDD classifier for future prediction.
bibtex: @INPROCEEDINGS{5360521,author={Xiao, Yanshan and Liu, Bo and Cao, Longbing and Wu, Xindong and Zhang, Chengqi and Hao, Zhifeng and Yang, Fengzhao and Cao, Jie},booktitle={2009 IEEE International Conference on Data Mining Workshops}, title={Multi-sphere Support Vector Data Description for Outliers Detection on Multi-distribution Data}, year={2009},volume={},number={},pages={82-87},doi={10.1109/ICDMW.2009.87}}
